name: Takao Onoye
content: Takao Onoye Takao ONOYE [in Japanese] Information Systems Synthesis Laboratory, Osaka University Position Professor Voice +81(6)6879.4525 FAX +81(6)6879.4529 E-mail onoye @ist.osaka-u.ac.jp Address Department of Information Systems Engineering Osaka University 1-5 Yamada-Oka, Suita, Osaka, 565-0871 Japan Arnis Sound Technologies, Co., Ltd. Voice +81(3)5749.3621 FAX +81(3)5749.3625 E-mail t.onoye @arns.com Address Arnis Sound Technologies, Co., Ltd. 2-7-9 Kitasenzoku, Ota-ku, Tokyo, 145-0062 Japan Research Areas System-on-a-Chip Design JPEG2000 System Implementation Low-Power Architecture IP Development & Provision Biography Takao Onoye received Dr.Eng. degree in information systems engineering from Osaka University, Japan, in 1997. He joined Osaka University as a research associate in 1993, and promoted as a lecturer in 1998. Since 1999 through 2002, he was with Kyoto University as an associate professor. He is currently a professor of the Department of Information Systems Engineering, Osaka University. His research interests include System-on-a-Chip implementation of multimedia (audiovisual) processing system. Dr. Onoye is a member of IEEE, IEICE, IPSJ, and ITE of Japan. Selected Publications Information Systems Synthesis Laboratory Osaka University Arnis Sound Technologies, Co., Ltd.
